name: Capture the Quack
description:
Have you wondered what ducks do in their free time? They go to the duck version of the gladiators, the Quack Arena.

Play Capture the Quack and be in the Quack Arena, play against your friends. What is Capture the Quack? Its a multiplayer, flag-capturing, fast-paced, strategy arena game! Full of guns, ducks and ridiculous levels. What are you waiting for? Go ahead and download!
